B

betterBuy(float[], float[], float[], float[], float[], String[]) - Static method in class model.Operations
Calculate the best price to buy according to the establishments
pre: betterBuy array and place array must be initialized
post: Calculation of the best prices and their respective establishments

post: Stores the typed product information in the arrangements

P

printBetterBuy(float[], String[], String[], float) - Static method in class ui.Main
Print product, best price, establishment and total payment to which it corresponds
pre: The arrangements must have the corresponding information
post: Shows on screen the name of the product, the lowest price, the establishment to which it belongs and the total payment
printProducts(String[], int[]) - Static method in class ui.Main
Print the products for the use that they were given in the work
pre:
post: It shows on the screen a list of products by use, according to the user choose the type of work
printTotalPrice(float[]) - Static method in class ui.Main
Print the total purchase price for each establishment
pre:
post: Displays the total prices in each establishment
productsPrice(float[], float[], float[], String[]) - Static method in class ui.Main
Ask for the price of each product in three establishments
pre: Homecenter, District and Center arrangements must be initialized
post: The value of the respective product is stored in each arrangement.

S

size() - Static method in class ui.Main
Ask for the quantity of products to define the size of the arrangements
pre:
post: Returns quantity of products / size of arrangements

T

totalBetterBuy(float[]) - Static method in class model.Operations
Retorna el total acumulado de los mejores precios y costo por domicilio
pre: Arreglo butterBuy debe tener almacenados los mejores precios
post: Calcula el total acumulado de los mejores precios y el domicilio
totalPrice(float[], float[], float[], float[], float[]) - Static method in class model.Operations
Calculate the total price of the work for each establishment
pre: Array totalPrice must be initialized
post: Calculation of the total price for each establishment
